RESOLVED_ENTITIES.two vehicles: RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the two vehicles: RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle

Defendant who challenges the traffic stop performed by United States Border Patrol Agent Jorge Luis Trevino
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: White Malibu sedan stopped by United States Border Patrol Agent Jorge Luis Trevino, lacked wind farm sticker and was traveling on Farm-to-Market Road 2050 with out-of-town registration from Hertz Rental Car Company
Defendant who challenges the stop of his vehicle by Officer Reymundo Reyes
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: Black Dodge pickup truck stopped by Officer Reymundo Reyes, suspected to harbor illegal aliens due to its proximity to the Mexico border, lacked wind farm sticker and was traveling on Farm-to-Market Road 2050 with out-of-town registration from Corinth, Texas
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle and IGN: Vehicles involved in the incident, including a white Malibu sedan and a black Dodge pickup truck, stopped near the Border Patrol Station Parking Lot, suspected of transporting illegal aliens, both lacked wind farm stickers and were traveling in tandem on Farm-to-Market Road 2050 with out-of-town registrations
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: Law enforcement agency involved in the incident
